data.title: Rasheed Wallace - Age, Family, Bio
data.meta_description: Rasheed Wallace: his birthday, what he did before fame, his family life, fun trivia facts, popularity rankings, and more.
data.text:
About

NBA power forward/center known for his three-point shooting as well as for constantly jabbing and complaining to referees. He played for the Portland Trail Blazers for eight seasons and helped lead the Detroit Pistons to an NBA Championship in 2004.

Before Fame

His University of North Carolina reached the final four in 1995, his final year with the team. He was then drafted 4th overall by the Washington Bullets after the season.

Trivia

He received 41 technical fouls during the 2000-01 season.

Family Life

Wallace has four children with his former wife Fatima: sons Ishmiel, Malik and Nazir and daughter Rashaya.

Associated With
